alert.note: Alert for Boone; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kanawha, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Boone Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Chesapeake, or 13 miles east of Madison, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Cedar Grove, East Bank, Glasgow, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Pratt, Powellton, Handley, Seth, Leewood, Dawes, Sharon, Eskdale and Pond Gap. This includes West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 70 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
